widget.name: LostBrick
widget.description: LostBrick is a gravity changing game. The Brick is falling off the big rectangle and wants to be brought back to his place. It is a Jump 'n' Run game with additional gravity influencing the way you play, because there is different gravity on each side of the world. This game was made by Roman Kuhn, Marcus Schoch and Jan Schneider at the lecture "3-dim. Grundlagen im medialen Raum" with Prof. Dr. Franklin Hernández-Castro at the Hochschule für Gestaltung Schwäbisch Gmünd in wintersemester 2017/18.
widget.author: Jan Schneider
